name: PasswordPusher
description: An application to communicate passwords over the web. Passwords expire after a certain number of views and/or time has passed.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.

PAYLOAD_INITIAL_TEXT.description: The initial text for the input field
PAYLOAD_INITIAL_TEXT.value: Enter the Password to be Shared

EXPIRE_AFTER_DAYS_DEFAULT.description: Default value for expire after days

DARK_THEME.description: When true, the original dark theme will be used. When turned off a light theme will be used

DELETABLE_BY_VIEWER_DEFAULT.description: When the option DELETABLE_BY_VIEWER_PASSWORDS is set to true, this option does two things: 1. Sets the default check state for the "Allow viewers to optionally delete password before expiration" checkbox. 2. Sets the default value for newly pushed passwords if unspecified (such as with a json request)
